docs.text:
H5VZR - Frontend


Requirements


{
  
node
: 
=0.12

}




Set up your environment


Install prerequisites


# Update npm
npm install -g npm

# Install yo
npm install -g grunt-cli bower yo generator-karma generator-angular




Install npm and bower deps


# cd into h5vzr
cd h5vr

# npm deps
npm install

# bower deps
bower install

# loopback services (requires api prerequisites)
lb-ng ../api/server/server.js app/scripts/services/lb-services.js




Usage


# serve
grunt serve

# build
grunt build

# test
npm test




Further Help: 
Yeoman Guide

docs.text:
API - Backend


Requirements


{
  
node
: 
=0.12
,
  
mongodb
: 
=2.6

}




Set up your environment


Install prerequisites


Install MongoDB: 
Offical Guide


# Update npm if you haven't already
npm install -g npm

# Install loopback
npm install -g strongloop




Install npm deps


# cd into api
cd api

# npm deps
npm install




Usage


# start mongodb daemon (in separate window/tab)
mongod

# run
node .




Further Help: 
Strongloop Guide
docs.title: API

docs.text:
Install prerequisites  Install MongoDB:  Offical Guide  # Update npm if you haven't already
npm install -g npm

# Install loopback
npm install -g strongloop  Install npm deps  # cd into api
cd api

# npm deps
npm install

docs.text:
# start mongodb daemon (in separate window/tab)
mongod

# run
node .  Further Help:  Strongloop Guide
docs.title: Usage

docs.text:
RASPI - Metering Unit


Requirements


{
  
python
: 
=2.7

}




Set up your environment


Install prerequisites


# cd into raspi
cd raspi

# optionally use a virtualenv
pip install --upgrade virtualenv
virtualenv .env
source .env/bin/activate

# python deps
pip install --upgrade -r requirements.txt




Compile Sensor scripts


# cd into raspi/sensors
cd sensors

# compile scripts in raspi/sensors
make




Usage


# run
python run.py

# run config server
python run.py --config

# run emu sensor script (for test usages)
python run.py --emu
docs.title: RASPI

docs.text:
Install prerequisites  # cd into raspi
cd raspi

# optionally use a virtualenv
pip install --upgrade virtualenv
virtualenv .env
source .env/bin/activate

# python deps
pip install --upgrade -r requirements.txt  Compile Sensor scripts  # cd into raspi/sensors
cd sensors

# compile scripts in raspi/sensors
make
docs.title: Set up your environment

docs.text:
# run
python run.py

# run config server
python run.py --config

# run emu sensor script (for test usages)
python run.py --emu
